attributes.description: The mean concordance of CCS reads that mapped to the reference sequence
attributes.name: Mapped CCS Read Mean Concordance

attributes.description: The number of CCS reads that mapped to the reference sequence
attributes.name: Number of CCS Reads (mapped)

attributes.description: The number of CCS read bases that mapped to the reference sequence
attributes.name: Number of CCS Bases (mapped)

attributes.description: The mean length of CCS reads that mapped to the reference sequence
attributes.name: CCS Read Length Mean (mapped)

attributes.description: The read length at which 50% of the bases are in reads longer than, or equal to, this value
attributes.name: CCS Read Length N50 (mapped)

attributes.description: The 95th percentile of length of CCS reads that mapped to the reference sequence
attributes.name: CCS Read Length 95% (mapped)

attributes.description: The maximum length of CCS reads that mapped to the reference sequencee
attributes.name: CCS Read Length Max (mapped)
